title: Beyond the Pale (with Andrew Bridgen MP)
itunes:title: Beyond the Pale (with Andrew Bridgen MP)
description:
Andrew Bridgen MP says domestic vaccine passports are unacceptable and he will vote against them 'every day of the week'. When it comes to crime, the Conservative MP for North West Leicestershire says voters will judge the government on results.

Plus: Was it right for Dawn Butler MP to be ejected from the Commons for use of 'unparliamentary language'? Ruth Fox from the Hansard Society tells us why historic rules still have a place in the 21st century.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
